325099-01.bin.title: C64 Diagnostic Rev 586220
325099-01.bin.description: The standard Commodore 64 diagnostic cartridge. Tests RAM, ROM, VIC-II, SID, CIA, and keyboard. Requires loopback harness for full port testing.

325109-10.bin.title: 1541 Diagnostic
325109-10.bin.description: Diagnostic ROM for the 1541 disk drive. Usually requires a modified drive or specific test harness.

c128_burnin_rev1.0_5.6.89.bin.title: C128 Burn-In Test Rev 1.0
c128_burnin_rev1.0_5.6.89.bin.description: Factory burn-in test for Commodore 128. Used for long-term stability testing during manufacturing.

c128_diag_rev1.2.bin.title: C128 Diagnostic Rev 1.2
c128_diag_rev1.2.bin.description: Early diagnostic revision for the Commodore 128. Tests VDC, VIC-IIe, SID, and memory banking.

c128_diag_rev6.8_9.11.88.bin.title: C128 Diagnostic Rev 6.8
c128_diag_rev6.8_9.11.88.bin.description: Late revision factory diagnostic for C128. Comprehensive testing of 80-column mode, MMU, and fast serial.

c128_final_burnin_rev7.0_5.6.89.bin.title: C128 Final Burn-In Rev 7.0
c128_final_burnin_rev7.0_5.6.89.bin.description: Final factory burn-in test for C128/C128D. Runs automated cycles of memory and chip tests.

c64gs_diag.1.1.bin.title: C64GS Diagnostic Rev 1.1
c64gs_diag.1.1.bin.description: Diagnostic for the C64 Games System (console). Tests the simplified hardware and joystick ports.

c64gs_diag.2.0.bin.title: C64GS Diagnostic Rev 2.0
c64gs_diag.2.0.bin.description: Updated diagnostic for C64GS. Includes improved controller tests.

c64_burn-in_7.2_5.6.89.bin.title: C64 Burn-In Test Rev 7.2
c64_burn-in_7.2_5.6.89.bin.description: Late era burn-in test for C64C/C64G. Used to stress test the system over time.

c64_burn-in_test.bin.title: C64 Burn-In Test (Generic)
c64_burn-in_test.bin.description: Standard burn-in loop for C64. Displays cycling colors and tests RAM continuously.

c64_diag_rev4.1.1.bin.title: C64 Diagnostic Rev 4.1.1
c64_diag_rev4.1.1.bin.description: Common factory diagnostic for C64. Excellent for troubleshooting bad RAM or faulty custom chips.

c64_final_burnin_26.10.88.bin.title: C64 Final Burn-In (1988)
c64_final_burnin_26.10.88.bin.description: Factory acceptance test from 1988. Used before final packaging.

c64_hot_burn-In.bin.title: C64 Hot Burn-In
c64_hot_burn-In.bin.description: Stress test designed to be run while the system is in a heat chamber.
